title: Link Contact Me button to Gmail compose

requirements.text: Update the “Contact Me” button in the Contact section (frontend/src/App.tsx) so that clicking it opens the Gmail web compose page addressed to randombookcreator@gmail.com using a Gmail compose URL (not a mailto link).

quotes: link the contact me to a draft in gmail to "randombookcreator@gmail.com"

acceptanceCriteria: The “Contact Me” control is rendered as a link (e.g., Button with asChild <a>) that navigates to https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=randombookcreator@gmail.com.
The link opens in a new tab/window and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
No mailto: link is used anywhere for the “Contact Me” action.
The visible label remains “Contact Me” (English) and existing styling/spacing of the button remains consistent with the current design.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not change the backend (Motoko) for this request; this is a frontend-only link update.
nonGoals: Do not add any external email-sending integrations or backend email functionality.
Do not change any of the existing external gallery links in the Art Projects or Food Projects sections.
